title: Kwan Acupuncture & Herbs
cleaned_text: Welcome to Kwan Acupuncture & Herbs - your premier place for acupuncture, herbal remedies, and holistic healthcare. Whether you need to reduce chronic pain or a natural treatment plan for a gastro-digestive disorder you have come to the right place. We are a full-service alternative healthcare facility. At Kwan Acupuncture & Herbs, we work closely with our patients to improve their overall health and quality of life. We achieve outstanding results for our patients by performing holistic assessments and developing treatment plans that target the patient's specific concerns and needs. Our treatments include all the tools of Traditional Oriental Medicine, including acupuncture, herbal remedies, eastern nutrition, Tui-na (eastern massage), and the use of complimentary therapies and modalities. As you would expect, we follow the highest standard of care with regard to sanitation and treatment methods. Please call us to discuss your specific situation and needs. We look forward to calling you a patient and friend.
